author: cnauroth
msg: HDFS-6028. Print clearer error message when user attempts to delete required mask entry from ACL. Contributed by Chris Nauroth.

author: scottbw
msg: Created a new Authz filter for requests from widgets to APIs, for example for handling preferences and metadata. This is so we can migrate these facilities from relying on DWR.

author: scottbw
msg: Removed unused utility classes; these supported the UI for requesting and emailing API keys in Wookie 1.x
